input.sentences: we were doing some set up for the concert following us | getting paid good money to do it too .
here i am | with the squad .
getting the cameras set up was one of the easier parts | adjusting for glare and wind was exceptionally difficult | though .
here i am | taking a bit of a lie down .

output.sentences: I woke up early today to work on the set for this movie were working on.
It was kind of a chilly day, and extremely windy.
Because of the wind and the cold, it was a bit difficult to work.
We had to take breaks sometimes to bundle up.
But at the end of the day, we got everything we needed done.
